name: Red Runner
description:
Red Runner

Red Runner is now free and open source and always will be.

Get Source Code

This game is free of charge, you can play it anywhere anytime.

A Funny Infinite Runner.

Keep moving! Don't stop!

Try to reach your maximum speed to gain most score and get a new high score!

Keep away from dangerous enemies!

Join the Red Runner Community

Join our Discord Server

Download Red Runner Source Code

Patreon

Controls

Keyboard:

  • Movement: WASD, Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space, Up Arrow
  • Roll (Air, Land): Left Shift

Xbox 360 Controller:

  • Movement: D-pad
  • Jump: Y
  • Roll: B
Credits

This game is part of another big game, then your coins, score and high score will be saved for the next game, so pick more coins to get more reward for the next game!

  • Graphics: Free Platform Game Assets
  • Save System: Save Game Pro - Save Everything
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Thanks to all of the game development community for their awesome help.

Play & Enjoy

Help us to make it better
